turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Trex (card game).
turn.1: What is the meaning of Trex in the card game Trex?
turn.2: If Trex is announced, any player who holds four twos or three twos and the three of the fourth suit can require the cards to be thrown in.
turn.3: What happens if no one has four twos?
turn.4: The cards are shuffled and redealt, and the dealer can choose any contract that he has not already played (including Trex).
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: The game is repeated if a suit is closed without all jacks on the table  After 20 deals, when all four players have completed their kingdoms by choosing all five contracts, the game is over.
turn.8: The final scores indicate the result - the players with positive scores win by that amount, and the players with negative scores lose similarly.
turn.9: What are the scores at the end?
turn.10: The total points available in the five contracts are -75, -130, -100, -195, +500, so the total scores at the end of each kingdom and at the end of the whole game are always zero.
turn.11: Is there anything else you can share about the meaning of Trex?
turn.12: Online version of the game is available here: OnlineTrex   Generally, the king of hearts is an important game, and the easiest to pick if the player has the right cards.
